GSD.product_version: versions from v5.12 to before v5.19.4
GSD.description:
net: fix potential refcount leak in ndisc_router_discovery()

This is an automated ID intended to aid in discovery of potential security vulnerabilities. The actual impact and attack plausibility have not yet been proven.
This ID is fixed in Linux Kernel version v5.19.4 by commit 7998043d31d000c3a93f46182e6569dd0eecda34, it was introduced in version v5.12 by commit 6b2e04bc240fe9be9e690059f710e9f95346d34d. For more details please see the references link.

OSV.summary: net: fix potential refcount leak in ndisc_router_discovery()
